version_description: • Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• You can now print messages using Google Cloud Print or AirPrint.
• You can now print messages using Google Cloud Print or AirPrint.
• You can now print messages using Google Cloud Print or AirPrint.
• Gmail now supports the text size that you’ve selected on your iPhone.
• Gmail now supports the text size that you’ve selected on your iPhone.
• Gmail now shows a progress bar when sending from the Share extension.
• Gmail now shows a progress bar when sending from the Share extension.
• You can now add non-Google email accounts to the Gmail app via IMAP.
• You can now add non-Google email accounts to the Gmail app via IMAP.

• iPhone X support.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• You can now change your password, update your profile picture and more by visiting My Account in settings.
• You can now change your password, update your profile picture and more by visiting My Account in settings.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• You can now more easily stay on top of your inbox with improved notification formatting.
• You can now use the new snooze button to put off emails that you just can’t get to right now.
• You can now use the new snooze button to put off emails that you just can’t get to right now.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Thanks for using Gmail! This release provides bug fixes that improve our product to help you get more out of your inbox.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• You can now stay focused without interruption by turning on high-priority notifications for your important messages.
• Thanks for using Gmail! This release provides bug fixes that improve our product to help you get more out of your inbox.
• Thanks for using Gmail! This release provides bug fixes that improve our product to help you get more out of your inbox.

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• You can now dismiss the prompts that appear to remind you to follow up on an email
• VoiceOver now announces system labels as expected
• VoiceOver now announces the correct text when editing a message

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• You can now turn off conversation view to view emails individually in your inbox
• You will now receive haptic feedback when selecting and deselecting items

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• You can now share multiple photos into Gmail
• VoiceOver now announces the correct text when turning off conversation view to view emails individually

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• VoiceOver now announces the correct text when recipient suggestions are displayed
• Search corrections are correctly displayed when conversation view is off
将文件分享至 Gmail 时，系统现会默认分享至最近使用的帐号。

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• In the new All Inboxes view, you can now see all of your emails across multiple accounts at once. No more switching between accounts!

This release also includes formatting fixes in vacation responder messages.

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• Now optimised for iOS 12 and iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max devices
• Get notifications grouped by account automatically
• Enable keyboard shortcuts for iPad devices
• Open Microsoft Office files without receiving an error message

This release brings fixes that help you get more out of your inbox:

• You can now swipe forward to get search suggestions when using VoiceOver for searching

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• Now optimised for iPhone XR devices

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• In the new All Inboxes view, you can now see all of your emails across multiple accounts at once. No more switching between accounts!

This release also includes formatting fixes in vacation responder messages.

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• In the new All Inboxes view, you can now see all of your emails across multiple accounts at once. No more switching between accounts!

This release also includes formatting fixes in vacation responder messages.

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• You can now add even more email accounts to Gmail and see all of your emails across more accounts at once in the All Inboxes view

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• You can now snooze messages even when conversation view is off

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• Now optimized for the new Apple iPad Pro

This release brings enhancements that help you get more out of your inbox:

• Images saved to the camera roll are not downsized, perfect for all the storage in your new Apple iPad Pro!
This release provides iPad fixes, so you can pick and choose snooze times that work best for you.

Welcome to the new Gmail that helps you get more done!

• You can now quickly view attachments, such as photos, without opening or scrolling through the conversation. Enable this by going into Settings and choosing the Default view in 'Conversation list density'

Welcome to the new Gmail that helps you get more done!

• Quickly switch accounts by tapping on your profile picture in the search bar

Welcome to the new Gmail that helps you get more done!

Swipe to snooze, swipe to archive… swipe how you want! Swoop these new swiping actions:
• Archive
• Bin
• Mark as read/unread
• Snooze
• Move to

Expert tip: if you change your swipe settings, these actions are also available for notifications!

Get more done with Gmail!

• You can now mark messages as important
• You can now see which messages are important to you with importance markers

Get more done with Gmail by scheduling messages to be sent later. This is a great way to remember a friend’s birthday, or even respect others’ digital wellbeing by not sending messages over the weekend.

• When composing a new message, click on the menu and choose 'Schedule send' to select a date and time for the message to be sent
• You can now view messages that you have scheduled to be sent later in the 'Scheduled' label
Gmail 助您事半功倍！您现在可以在 iPad 上撰写新邮件的同时查看收到的邮件

Write emails faster with Smart Compose, now available in English.

From your greeting to your closing (and common phrases in between), Smart Compose gives you suggestions as you write. Powered by machine learning, Smart Compose is also getting, well, smarter. It will personalise suggestions for you, so if you prefer saying 'Ahoy', or 'Ello, mate' in your greetings, Smart Compose will suggest just that.

Gmail 助您事半功倍！

• 您现可通过“设置”屏幕为收件箱设置“主要”、“推广”和“社交”等自定义标签

Gmail 助您事半功倍！

• 使用机密模式发送邮件。您可以使用机密模式移除转发、复制、下载或打印邮件的选项。您还可以将邮件设为在一段时间后过期，确保您随时掌握最新信息。
现在，您可以选择让系统在自动显示外来图片前先询问。要为新收到的邮件启用此功能，请转到“设置”>“特定帐号”>“图片”，然后选择“显示外来图片前询问我”。
高级提示（如果您还不知道）：现在，您可以通过上下滑动您的个人资料照片来快速切换帐号。
高级提示（如果您还不知道）：现在，您可以通过上下滑动您的个人资料照片来快速切换帐号。
升级至 iOS 13 后，您现可在邮件中播放音频附件。
升级到 iOS 13 后，通知标志数量将正确反映未读邮件的数量。
将文件分享至 Gmail 时，系统现会默认分享至最近使用的帐号。
升级到 iOS 13 后，打开长邮件线程会更加稳定
修正了多个问题并提升了性能。
修正了多个问题并提升了性能。
'Hey Siri, send an email.' You can now add a shortcut to Siri to send an email faster.
“Hey Siri, send an email”. You can now add a shortcut to Siri to send an email faster.
升级到 iOS 13 后，发送电子邮件将变得更可靠。
'Hey Siri, send an email.' You can now add a shortcut to Siri to send an email faster.
升级到 iOS 13 后，发送电子邮件将变得更可靠。
You can now send emails more reliably after upgrading to iOS 13.
You can now add attachments from the iOS Files app.
Pro tip (if you haven't noticed): You can now switch between dark or light themes after upgrading to iOS 13. Or you can use the default system theme.
现在，在“已发邮件”文件夹中查看邮件时，您可以快速查看邮件的收件人。
现在，在“已发邮件”文件夹中查看邮件时，您可以快速查看邮件的收件人。
When using an iPad, you’re now able to multi-task with Gmail and other iOS apps.
When using an iPad, you’re now able to multi-task with Gmail and other iOS apps.
利用 Gmail 中新增的“会议”标签页，您现在可以从收件箱中轻松加入视频会议。
利用 Gmail 中新增的“会议”标签页，您现在可以从收件箱中轻松加入视频会议。
修正了多个问题并提升了性能。
新：如果您使用的操作系统是 iOS 14，现在即可将 Gmail 设为您的默认电子邮件应用。请按照应用内提示，或前往“设置”>“Gmail”，将 Gmail 设为默认电子邮件应用。
新：如果您使用的操作系统是 iOS 14，现在即可将 Gmail 设为您的默认电子邮件应用。请按照应用内提示，或前往“设置”>“Gmail”，将 Gmail 设为默认电子邮件应用。
新：如果您使用的操作系统是 iOS 14，现在即可将 Gmail 设为您的默认电子邮件应用。请按照应用内提示，或前往“设置”>“Gmail”，将 Gmail 设为默认电子邮件应用。
新：如果您使用的操作系统是 iOS 14，现在即可将 Gmail 设为您的默认电子邮件应用。请按照应用内提示，或前往“设置”>“Gmail”，将 Gmail 设为默认电子邮件应用。
感谢您使用 Gmail！此版本推出了全新的 Gmail 图标并修复了多个问题，进一步改进了产品，可协助您一站式完成更多工作。
感谢您使用 Gmail！此版本推出了全新的 Gmail 图标并修复了多个问题，进一步改进了产品，可协助您一站式完成更多工作。
• 修正了多个错误并提升了性能。
现在，您可以将 Gmail 小组件添加到主屏幕，以轻松管理电子邮件。

您现在可以将最多 90 天的电子邮件同步至您的设备。
'Hey Siri, start a new meeting.' You can now add a shortcut to Siri to start a new Meet call faster!
